inout

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • inout.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Get all the keyboard and mouse data. It can tell if a key state has changed, what its current state is now. It can read and write from a key mapping file (res/keymap.xml) and is fully configurable.
    Author:
    Christopher Dombroski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte buttonCount
      The number of button available on the users mouse.
      static int deltaX
      Change in mouse location since last refresh().
      static int deltaY
      Change in mouse location since last refresh().
      static boolean hasMouseWheel
      Whether or not the user's mouse has a mousewheel.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Byte> keyChanged
      Whether of not the indicated keys have changed state.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> keyDown
      Whether or not the indicated keys are down.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> keys
      List of all the keys.
      static byte[] mouseChanged 
      static boolean[] mouseDown 
      static int mouseX
      Mouse location on the OpenGl Display
      static int mouseY
      Mouse location on the OpenGl Display
      static byte NO_CHANGE
      Value for a key not being changed.
      static byte PRESSED
      Value for a key being pressed.
      static byte RELEASED
      Value for a key being Released.
